item.description:
Venez a une soiree potluck chez Jenny a Portsmouth. Apportez quelquechose a manger avec les autres (Jenny s'occupera du menu). Et on jouera au Monopoly -- en francais, bien sur!

RSVP en avance pour programmer le menu, merci!

Please RSVP *NOW* (Yes, Maybe, or No) and select "Send me reminders before the event" to give yourself an opportunity to change your RSVP later. Please RSVP soon, so Jenny can work out the menu and Pam can send you contact info. Merci!

P.S. This event is very soon after the last one and that not everyone will be available, but ... we're trying to play by the rules, here (1st Saturday, 3rd Wednesday).

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Seacoast NH French Language October Meetup #1
